name: Countless Rooms of Death
description: Countless Rooms of Death is a puzzle / adventure game with a horror atmosphere. There are no weapons or real enemies; instead, we aim to bully your mind. All you, the player, have is a flashlight with which to find your way through a dark labyrinth, solving puzzles to acquire keys which will allow you to enter the next level.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3-compatible video card Storage: 600 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The options menu Is dreadful.  The game its self feels unbelievably repetitive after you walk throught the fifth door or so. Not worth the Price. Don't buy this unless you don't mind losing out.
This isn't even a game, you just walk through rooms with some doors locked and some unlocked, I did not find anything else. To make matters worse the rooms are really repetitive.
